Sale-Leaseback Advisors

Providing real estate advisory services tailored to institutional investors and businesses across the middle market.

At SAB Capital, we are experts in providing specially

tailored sale-leaseback solutions for companies and professional investors from all backgrounds.

Our team specializes in sale-leaseback transactions, debt and equity placement, and asset acquisition to help clients fund growth initiatives and reinvest in business infrastructure.

Through our professional guidance, we assist clients in formulating sound investment strategies and financing options with short- and long-term benefits and stability. Our extensive experience working with diverse industries and unique assets allows us to draw competitive offers and structure advantageous deals.

representative transactions

Sale-leasebacks are an efficient and increasingly popular solution with real estate owners, investors, and businesses. Our team has structured deals for a diverse client base with backgrounds in a variety of specialized markets and industries and can craft solutions to fit complex agendas and meet ambitious goals.
